Full Stack Developer

Work

Game Store

Github Live

A video game store made with React, Tailwind, React Router and React Testing Library. Data is fetched from an API. Add and remove items from the cart, search for games and a page dedicated to each game.

CV Maker

Github Live

A resume creator made with React. It has several sections for education, projects, skills etc. You can also download your resume in pdf form.

Colour Memo

Github Live

A memory card game made with React. It has infinite levels with increasing difficulty. Data is fetched from an API.

Battleship

Github Live

A strategy game made with Javascript and tested with Jest. The player plays against AI. Choose to either randomly place or handplace the ships.

Restaurant Page

Github Live

It has several pages for the restaurant's menu, hours of operation and location, contact etc. It's also fully responsive.
